author: bridge-bot
content:
<KolbyML> @gr3999 @salakhiev @tcoratger recently we have been updating our devnet0 implementation following the specs for devnet 1. I noticed that qlean/zeam are still using the process_attestations() implementation from devnet 0. We need to do more testing, but maybe the the `process_attestations()` implementation from the spec is broken? or we made a mistake implementating the updated specs.

Either way for devnet1 are we keeping the devnet0 `process_attestations()` implementation` or are we updating to the leanSpec version?

author: bridge-bot
content:
<KolbyML> Anyways I guess we will try reverting our updated `process_attestations()` implementation and seeing if it works with the rest of our code being updated.

We haven't finished integrating the leanSpec test cases, so maybe that will make things more clear idk
